Category:The Empire Strikes Back radio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Perry King (born April 30, 1948) is a voice actor who portrayed Han Solo in the radio adaptation of Star Wars and in Episode IV: A New Hope Read-Along Storybook and CD. He also auditioned for the same role in the original film, A New Hope.

In 1974, he appeared in two episodes of the television series Hawaii Five-O, played Cody Allen on the detective series Riptide from 1983 to 1986. and in 1995, he appeared on Melrose Place as Kristin Davis' father. He also played the president of the United States in Roland Emmerich's 2004 disaster film The Day After Tomorrow.
